p: This study used several texts, including the Makhzan-al-Adviah, written by MH Aghili Khorasani in 1772Â A.D. ( Aghili Khorasani, 1771 AD), which is the most recent and complete encyclopedia of medicinal materials in TPM, as well as The Great Continens ( Rhazes, 960) and The Canon of Medicine ( Avicenna, 1025). We searched these books/manuscripts for references to medicinal plants that are described as having protective properties against humor infection and excitation, as well as tonifying and protecting effects on the lungs, heart, and kidney.
